verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Command <S%H6680><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that they <S%H3947>bring<s%> unto thee <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H3795>beaten<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, to cause a <S%H5216>lamp<s%> to <S%H5927>burn<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

Without <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H6532>veil<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%>, in the <S%H168>tent<s%> of <S%H4150>meeting<s%>, shall <S%H175>Aaron<s%> keep it in <S%H6186>order<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>.
He shall keep in <S%H6186>order<s%> the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> upon the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H3947>take<s%> fine <S%H5560>flour<s%>, and <S%H644>bake<s%> <S%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H2471>cakes<s%> <S%H8147>thereof<s%>: two tenth parts of an <S%H6241>ephah<s%> shall be in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2471>cake<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H7760>set<s%> them in <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4634>rows<s%>, <S%H8337>six<s%> on a <S%H4635>row<s%>, upon the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2134>pure<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> upon each <S%H4635>row<s%>, that it may be to the <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H234>memorial<s%>, even an offering made by <S%H801>fire<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Every <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> day he shall set <S%H3117>it<s%> in <S%H6186>order<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%>; it is on the behalf of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And it shall be for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons<s%>; and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in a <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>: for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto him of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%> by a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2706>statute<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>son<s%> of an <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>, whose <S%H1121>father<s%> was an <S%H376>Egyptian<s%>, went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> woman and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> strove <S%H5327>together<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%>:

and the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H3482>Israelitish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H5344>blasphemed<s%> the <S%H8034>Name<s%>, and <S%H7043>cursed<s%>; and they <S%H935>brought<s%> him unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>. And his <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1704>Dibri<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.
And they <S%H3240>put<s%> him in <S%H4929>ward<s%>, that it might be <S%H6567>declared<s%> unto them at the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that hath <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; and let all that <S%H8085>heard<s%> him <S%H5564>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hands<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, and let all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> stone <S%H7275>him<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H1696>speak<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H376>Whosoever<s%> <S%H3588>curseth<s%> his <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H2399>sin<s%>.

And he that <S%H5344>blasphemeth<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, he shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>; all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H7275>certainly<s%> <S%H7275>stone<s%> <S%H1616>him<s%>: as well the sojourner, as the <S%H249>home-born<s%>, when he <S%H5344>blasphemeth<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H4191>Jehovah<s%>, shall be put to death.
And <S%H376>he<s%> that smiteth <S%H5315>any<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5221>mortally<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
And he that smiteth a <S%H5315>beast<s%> <S%H5221>mortally<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good<s%>, <S%H5315>life<s%> for <S%H5315>life<s%>.
And if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>cause<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in his <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>; as he hath <S%H6213>done<s%>, so shall it be done to <S%H6213>him<s%>:

breach <S%H7667><s%> for <S%H7667>breach<s%>, <S%H5869>eye<s%> for <S%H5869>eye<s%>, <S%H8127>tooth<s%> for <S%H8127>tooth<s%>; as he hath <S%H5414>caused<s%> a <S%H3971>blemish<s%> in a <S%H120>man<s%>, so shall it be rendered unto <S%H5414>him<s%>.
And he that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> a <S%H929>beast<s%> shall make it <S%H7999>good<s%>: and he that <S%H5221>killeth<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>.
Ye shall have <S%H259>one<s%> manner of <S%H4941>law<s%>, as well for the <S%H1616>sojourner<s%>, as for the <S%H249>home-born<s%>: for I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and they brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> him that had <S%H7043>cursed<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H7275>stones<s%>. And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
